equipment.name: GreenArmor
equipment.description: Standard issue armor amongst UAC Marines. It won't save you from a fireblast, but bullets won't be much of an issue, at least from basic infantry weaponry.

assembly.name: SilencedPistol
assembly.description:
Converts the weapon into a stealthy weapon, that will not alert monsters beyond close range.
The effect of a blursphere will increase their damage exponentially while it is active.
valid:
Pistol ->
 Silenced Pistol
Battle Rifle ->
 Stealth Rifle

weapon.name: Pistol
stats:
Base weapon stats
Fire rate: 19 tics (0.5s)
Damage: (6d3)
Reload: 37 tics (1.0s)
Spread: 4 x 0
weapon.quote: "Your trusty 10mm pistol. It may be nice, but better find something stronger."
weapon.description:
Standard UAC pistol, chambered for the 10mm round.
Good for potshots at the odd zombie or three, but when you start seeing stronger foes, it's time to find something better.
weapon.mods: This weapon can support up to four modifications
